org.gbif.checklistbank.index

Class NameUsageDocConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.checklistbank.index.NameUsageDocConverter

  • public class NameUsageDocConverter
extends Object
    Threadsafe class that transforms a NameUsage object into SolrInputDocument.
